title: REST API access to an instance to Polyglot (NLP application)
snippet:
Looking for a developer with experience utilizing natural language processing tools. The job requires the freelancer to setup an instance of Polyglot, the NLP application (http://polyglot.readthedocs.io/en/latest/), on a VPS and provide access to its functionality via a REST API created by the freelancer. Ideally, the application would be able to accept either a string or a URL   After processed by Polyglot the application should return the following data to the user in JSON format:

•Language detected.
•Named entities extracted.
•Sentiment of the text and the named entities extracted.
•Transliteration of the named entities to English.

Additionally, authentication of the user will be user will be needed.

Developers with extensive knowledge of Polyglot, NLTK, or Spacy are preferred.
Experience with Python and PHP a plus.
